constructor.name: ctor
constructor.summary: Creates a new instance of class.

property.name: DatabasesInfo
property.summary: Gets information about databases on server.

property.name: ServerConfig
property.summary: Gets the parameters and values for IB_CONFIG.

property.name: Version
property.summary: Gets the version of the services manager.

property.name: ServerVersion
property.summary: Gets the version of the Firebird server.

property.name: Implementation
property.summary: Gets the implementation of the Firebird server.

property.name: Capabilities
property.summary: Gets a bitmask representing the server's capabilities.

property.name: UserDatabasePath
property.summary: Gets the path to the security database in use by the server.

property.name: RootDirectory
property.summary: Gets the location of the Firebird root directory on the server; this is the value of the $INTERBASE system environment variable, or the contents of the registry key.

property.name: LockManager
property.summary: Gets the location of the InterBase lock manager file on the server; this is the value of the $INTERBASE_LCK system environment variable, or by default $INTERBASE/serverhostname.lck.

property.name: MessageFile
property.summary: Gets the location of the InterBase message file on the server; this is the value of the $INTERBASE_MSG system environment variable, or by default $INTERBASE/interbase.msg.

property.name: LicenseInfo
property.summary: Gets all license keys and IDs from the license file.

property.name: LicenseMask
property.summary: Gets a bitmask representing licensed options on the server.
